entry.title: Re: The Cat, BIP draft discussion.
entry.summary: The discussion revolves around the implications of a proposal that seems to target Bitcoin assets, acknowledging that while it aims to appropriate Bitcoins, it does not necessarily affect other areas such as NFT operations. The dialogue points out a common misconception regarding the exclusivity of financial impacts solely on Bitcoin, suggesting a broader perspective should be considered which includes the potential repercussions on the value of NFTs as well. It's highlighted that opinions on the appropriateness of NFTs in relation to Bitcoin vary, but those who suffer losses as a result of this proposal will likely pursue compensation through various means. This conversation underlines a critical view within the Bitcoin Development community about the need to reevaluate how proposals could inadvertently affect different aspects of digital asset holdings beyond just the immediate target of Bitcoins.
